column4: is there a tool for gnome to connect to the internet with a single mouseclick?
i setup a bash script that looks like this.. and then linked it on my desktop.. in the link properties for it i told it to run in console
i just had it run a script in /run/wlanup... the wlanup file says... iwconfig eth1 key <my wep> ; ifup eth1
does it also close an open connection?
